clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Mass Babance and Biotransformation of [14C]SHR1459 in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Mass Balance and Biotransformation Study of [14C]SHR1459 in Chinese Healthy Adult Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the Mass Babance and Biotransformation of [14C]SHR1459 in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: cumulative recovery of total radioactive substances in urine and/or feces;
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to Day 21 (approx) from the start of administration.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of metabolites in urine and feces in dose administration (% of dose administration) or percentage of circulating metabolites in plasma in total exposure AUC (%AUC);
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to Day 21 (approx) from the start of administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Evevts(AEs) and Serious Adverse Events.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to Day 21 (approx) from the start of administration.

intervention.description: Patients will receive single dose of orally [14C]SHR1459 on Day 1.
